Class LegoCollection

java.lang.Object
com.example.legodmsproject.LegoCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
Menu
public class LegoCollection extends Object implements Menu
Elia Schwartz October 10, 2025, CEN 3024C 14877 Software Development 1 LegoCollection.java This class has the implementation code for each method declaration in the Menu interface that the user will interact with when the program is run,
